alert.note: Alert for Coastal Matagorda; Inland Matagorda; Matagorda Islands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 1:24PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Matagorda County through 200 PM CDT... At 124 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near South Texas Nuclear Plant, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Matagorda, South Texas Nuclear Plant and Wadsworth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Matagorda; Inland Matagorda; Matagorda Islands
